穀子.definition: millet; (ACG) collectible merch (loanword from "goods", via Japanese "guzzu")

穀梁.definition: two-character surname Guliang; abbr. for 穀梁傳|谷梁传[Gu3liang2 Zhuan4], Guliang Annals

穀梁傳.definition: Guliang Annals, commentary on the Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], first published during the Han Dynasty

穀神星.definition: Ceres, dwarf planet in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, discovered in 1801 by G. Piazzi

穀穗.definition: ear of grain; gerbe (used on coats of arms)

穀雨.definition: Guyu or Grain Rain, 6th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th April-4th May
